name: Maokai
title: the Twisted Treant
shortBio: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his heartwood. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai now furiously battles to banish the scourge of unlife from the Shadow Isles and restore his home to its former beauty.

skins.name: Charred Maokai
skins.description: Once a steward of the gentle treefolk, Maokai was consumed along with his people when the Infernals ravaged the world. Now, brimming with rage, he seeks only to spread his anger and misery to anything that crosses his path.

skins.name: Festive Maokai
skins.description: Big, jolly, and possessed by a literal holiday spirit, the living fir tree known as Maokai loves nothing more than to unwrap the presents tucked under him every year. He would prefer to do this away from the fire.

skins.name: Haunted Maokai
skins.description: Few locals dare to trick-or-treat past the forest just outside of town. Too many have vanished within that dreary woodland, where one feels the weight of unseen eyes, and even the trees are driven by a terrible hungerâ€¦

skins.name: Goalkeeper Maokai
skins.description: Debuting in the 2014 Soccer Cup, much of Maokai's career has rested on the Order United goalposts growing out of his back. As Maokai is a giant tree, you have to be pretty good to score on him.

skins.name: Meowkai
skins.description: Maokai has, at long last, embraced his role as a giant, haunted scratching post.

skins.name: Victorious Maokai
skins.description: Victorious Maokai was awarded to players who reached Gold or higher in the 2016 season. Victorious Maokai lays down his roots fashionably with vines of golden leaves, and a rich blue and gold robe.

skins.name: Worldbreaker Maokai

chromas.name: Worldbreaker Maokai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: An immense tree-like golem, Maokai grew from the very roots of the world, charred though they were by the last annihilation. Burdened to revive the world after every destructive cycle, he wanders for all eternity, reseeding the earth with his magical saplings, making way for the renewal of lifeâ€¦  only for it to be undone once more.

skins.name: Astronaut Maokai

chromas.name: Astronaut Maokai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: The first tree to grow on planet M33P, Maokai gained sentience due to the latent power of the meeps that took up residence in his trunk. He now fosters life on this new home of his, collecting and caring for young meeps that could use a helping hand (or branch).

skins.name: DRX Maokai

chromas.name: DRX Maokai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during DRX World Championship showcase.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during DRX World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring Juhan's winning performance as Maokai during the 2022 World Championship.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

spells.name: Bramble Smash
spells.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ plus @BasePercentHealth*100@% max Health magic damage</magicDamage> and briefly <status>Slowing</status>. Nearby enemies are also <status>Knocked Back</status>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Twisted Advance
spells.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
spells.dynamicDescription: Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming Untargetable and dashing to an enemy. Upon arrival, he <status>Roots</status> the enemy for @Effect2Amount@ second(s) and deals <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Sapling Toss
spells.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for @SaplingDuration@ seconds. Saplings chase nearby enemies, detonating on arrival to deal @TotalDamage@ magic damage and Slow surrounding enemies by @SlowAmount*100@% for @SlowDuration@ seconds. Sap Magic's Cooldown is reduced by an additional 4 seconds if the sapling hits an enemy champion or epic monster.

If placed in brush, Saplings instead last for @EmpoweredSaplingDuration@ seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing @TotalEmpoweredDamage@ magic damage over @EmpoweredDoTDuration@ seconds and Slowing enemies by @EmpoweredSlowAmount@.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Nature's Grasp
spells.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
spells.dynamicDescription: Maokai summons a colossal wave of brambles and thorns, <status>Rooting</status> enemies for @MinRootDuration@ to @MaxRootDuration@ seconds, increasing with distance travelled, and dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. Hitting a champion gives Maokai <speed>@MoveHaste*100@% Move Speed</speed>, decaying over @HasteDuration@ seconds. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
